entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle or light snow. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023
